# Paths/patterns to exclude from TruffleHog scans (globs)
# Images and binaries
*.png
*.jpg
*.jpeg
*.gif
*.svg
*.ico
*.pdf
*.zip
*.tar
*.gz
*.tgz
*.7z
*.exe
*.bin
*.dll

# Build and dependency folders
node_modules/**
vendor/**
dist/**
build/**
out/**

# Terraform internals
**/.terraform/**
**/.terraform.lock.hcl

# Documentation
docs/**
**/*.md

# Test fixtures (if any)
**/fixtures/**
**/testdata/**
